SELECT CC_ID , CC_NM , HGRK_CC_ID , DEPT_SORT_SEQC , DEPTH_LEVEL FROM ( SELECT T1.CC_ID ,T1.CC_NM ,T1.HGRK_CC_ID ,T1.DEPT_SORT_SEQC ,LTRIM (SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH (T1.CC_ID, ' > '), ' > ') AS DEPT_FULLNAME ,LEVEL AS DEPTH_LEVEL FROM HMST200T T1 WHERE T1.ORG_CRT_DATE <= #{stadDate} AND T1.ORG_CLOSE_DATE >= #{stadDate} START WITH T1.HGRK_CC_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR T1.CC_ID=T1.HGRK_CC_ID )
WHERE DEPT_FULLNAME NOT LIKE '%' || #{ccId} || '%'
ORDER BY DEPT_FULLNAME

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T1.CC_ID ,T1.CC_NM ,T1.HGRK_CC_ID , ( SELECT TT2.CC_NM AS HGRK_CC_NM FROM HMST201T TT2 WHERE (TT2.AVL_START_DATE BETWEEN T1.AVL_START_DATE AND T1.AVL_END_DATE OR TT2.AVL_END_DATE BETWEEN T1.AVL_START_DATE AND T1.AVL_END_DATE OR (TT2.AVL_START_DATE <= T1.AVL_START_DATE AND TT2.AVL_END_DATE >= T1.AVL_END_DATE) ) AND TT2.CC_ID = T1.HGRK_CC_ID AND TT2.AVL_END_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(AVL_END_DATE) FROM HMST201T TT2 WHERE (TT2.AVL_START_DATE BETWEEN T1.AVL_START_DATE AND T1.AVL_END_DATE OR TT2.AVL_END_DATE BETWEEN T1.AVL_START_DATE AND T1.AVL_END_DATE OR (TT2.AVL_START_DATE <= T1.AVL_START_DATE AND TT2.AVL_END_DATE >= T1.AVL_END_DATE) ) AND TT2.CC_ID = T1.HGRK_CC_ID ) ) AS HGRK_CC_NM ,T1.DEPT_SORT_SEQC ,T1.ORG_CRT_DATE ,T1.ORG_CLOSE_DATE ,T1.AVL_START_DATE ,T1.AVL_END_DATE ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T1.AVL_END_DATE DESC) AS ROWNUMBER FROM HMST201T T1 WHERE T1.CC_ID = #{ccId} ) WHERE ROWNUMBER BETWEEN #{pageSize} * (#{pageNumber} - 1) + 1 AND #{pageSize} * (#{pageNumber} - 1) + #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(T1.CC_ID) AS LIST_CNT FROM HMST201T T1 WHERE T1.CC_ID = #{ccId}

SELECT t1.cc_id, t1.cc_nm, t1.hgrk_cc_id, t1.dept_sort_seqc, t1.org_crt_date, t1.org_close_date, t1.avl_start_date, t1.avl_end_date FROM hmst201t t1 WHERE t1.cc_id = #{ccId} AND t1.avl_start_date = ( SELECT MAX(avl_start_date) FROM hmst201t tt1 WHERE tt1.cc_id = #{ccId} )

SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_01) IS NULL THEN 'S' -- 신규등록 WHEN SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_01) = 0 AND #{avlEndDate} > MAX(AVL_END_DATE) AND #{avlStartDate} > MAX(AVL_START_DATE) THEN 'LN'--최신 이력 추가 성공 WHEN SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_01) = 0 AND #{avlEndDate} >= MAX(AVL_END_DATE) AND #{avlStartDate} <= MAX(AVL_START_DATE) THEN 'LNE' --최신 이력 추가 실패 (2중중첩 이력) WHEN SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_01) = 0 AND #{avlEndDate} < MAX(AVL_END_DATE) AND (SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_02) + SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_03)) = 0 THEN 'MN' --중간 이력 추가 성공 WHEN SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_01) = 0 AND #{avlEndDate} < MAX(AVL_END_DATE) AND (SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_02) + SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_03)) > 0 THEN 'MLE' --중간 이력 추가 실패 (중첩기간 존재) WHEN SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_01) > 0 AND #{avlEndDate} >= MAX(AVL_END_DATE) AND (SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_04) + SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_05)) = 0 THEN 'LU' --최신 이력 변경 성공 WHEN SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_01) > 0 AND #{avlEndDate} >= MAX(AVL_END_DATE) AND (SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_04) + SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_05)) > 0 THEN 'LUE' --최신 이력 변경 실패 (중첩기간 존재) WHEN SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_01) > 0 AND #{avlEndDate} < MAX(AVL_END_DATE) AND (SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_04) + SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_05)) = 0 THEN 'MU' --중간 이력 변경 성공 WHEN SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_01) > 0 AND #{avlEndDate} < MAX(AVL_END_DATE) AND (SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_04) + SUM(T1_VAL_CHK_05)) > 0 THEN 'MUE' --중간 이력 변경 실패 (중첩기간 존재) ELSE 'E' END VAL_CHK FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN #{avlStartDate} = T1.AVL_START_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END T1_VAL_CHK_01 ,CASE WHEN #{avlStartDate} BETWEEN T1.AVL_START_DATE AND T1.AVL_END_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END T1_VAL_CHK_02 ,CASE WHEN #{avlEndDate} BETWEEN T1.AVL_START_DATE AND T1.AVL_END_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END T1_VAL_CHK_03 ,CASE WHEN T1.AVL_START_DATE <> #{avlStartDate} AND #{avlStartDate} BETWEEN T1.AVL_START_DATE AND T1.AVL_END_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END T1_VAL_CHK_04 ,CASE WHEN T1.AVL_START_DATE <> #{avlStartDate} AND #{avlEndDate} BETWEEN T1.AVL_START_DATE AND T1.AVL_END_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END T1_VAL_CHK_05 , T1.AVL_END_DATE , T1.AVL_START_DATE FROM HMST201T T1 WHERE CC_ID = #{ccId} )
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(CC_ID) IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '001' ELSE TO_CHAR(MAX(CC_ID) + 1) END CC_ID FROM HMST200T WHERE CC_ID >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '000' AND LENGTH(CC_ID) = 7
